message: Hey, are you still up for helping me move my couch on Saturday?
Of course! My back is already groaning, but I'll be there. What time?
Haha, I owe you one! How about 11 AM? I'll provide pizza and drinks as payment.
You had me at pizza. 11 AM works. Need me to bring anything? Rope? Gloves?
Just your legendary muscle power. I've got the rest covered.
Legendary, huh? The pressure is on! My reputation is at stake.
No worries, it's not too heavy. The tricky part is getting it down the staircase.
Ah, the classic staircase maneuver. My specialty. We'll manage.
Perfect. Thanks again, you're a lifesaver!
Any time! See you Saturday. And remember, extra pepperoni.
Extra pepperoni, guaranteed. Talk to you then!
